Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a plant receiving water and show it growing.
The student can illustrate a plant not receiving water and show it not growing well.
The student can illustrate a plant getting sunlight and show it thriving.
The student can illustrate a plant without sunlight and show it not thriving.
The student can observe and include patterns by drawing a healthy plant with water and light, and a struggling plant without water or light.
